items.content_html: Pipper is a lightweight social media application inspired by Twitter, built as a school project. It's a full-stack application with a frontend built using vanilla JavaScript, HTML/CSS, and Bootstrap, and a backend built with PHP connecting to a MySQL database. Users can create and edit "Pip" elements, similar to Tweets on Twitter.
items.title: Julboben/Pipper: Pipper is a lightweight social media application inspired by Twitter, built as a school project. It's a full-stack application with a frontend built using vanilla JavaScript, HTML/CSS, and Bootstrap, and a backend built with PHP connecting to a MySQL database. Users can create and edit "Pip" elements, similar to Tweets on Twitter.

items.content_html: A lightweight, open-source web browser extension for adjusting volume and equalizing sound. Built with performance and efficiency in mind, it's designed to work seamlessly on both high-end and low-end hardware. Contributions and pull requests welcome!
